editorialNotes.standard: Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: This blockbuster runner keeps charging ahead with loads of rewards to chase and special events set in cities across the world.

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It’s hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile–we still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: A fast and frantic battle royale
editorialNotes.standard: Survive the fierce battle for victory.
editorialNotes.short: Survive the fierce battle for victory.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Take your game to the max

editorialNotes.standard: We love rediscovering hedgehog history with this enhanced edition of one of Sonic’s greatest adventures. This game sizzles with all the sprawling levels and blazing speed you remember from the ’90s, but this classic platformer is better than ever on the App Store. With crisp widescreen graphics, tight controls and awesome extra content, it’s just a blast.
With exciting events, famous characters, and wild courses, Nintendo’s legendary kart-racing series burns rubber on mobile.
editorialNotes.short: Tour the world and race on tracks in cities around the globe.
This game serves up a perfect mix of arcade fun and serious simulation.

editorialNotes.standard: It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovio’s blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheen—and with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether it’s your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, you’ll be flying high in no time.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: How far can you roll the ball?
Build your team, own the pitch
Race and drive uphill to win!

editorialNotes.standard: Here comes the wave! In this gorgeous open-world RPG, explore eroded landscapes, battle otherworldly creatures and unlock incredible skills.

name: Tomb of the Mask: Pixel Maze

editorialNotes.standard: Speed is survival in this devilishly fast tomb-raiding arcade game. Like some glorious mix of Indiana Jones and Pac-Man, you race from room to room, nabbing all the coins you can while staying ahead of an ever-moving (and lethal) wall. With its crafty mazes, tricky traps, simple controls, and eye-popping retro minimalism, it’s an experience you’ll happily lose yourself in.

name: Highway Overtake - Car Racing
artistName: HYPERMONK GAMES OYUN YAZILIM PAZARLAMA VE DANISMANLIK ANONIM SIRKETI

ios.subtitle: Be ready to overtake on time!

editorialNotes.standard: If they see you coming, it’s too late! Your mind is still your best weapon in the updated version of this sneaky 2006 action game.

Always wanted to be a football star? Score! Hero puts you in the kit of a young upstart, making your way to bigger and better clubs. The controls couldn’t be simpler—simply draw a line where you want the ball to go, and let the action unfold. While the gameplay is easy to learn, Score! Hero also shines with depth, rewarding thoughtful passes and smart shots over wild swiping.

ios.subtitle: Control Mario with just a tap!

editorialNotes.standard: He's here! We're all about pulling off stylish moves with a single tap, thanks to super-simple, one-touch controls. But collecting all the pink coins? That takes skill. With tons of unlocks (including Luigi!), you’ll be playing this one long after you reach the final flagpole.

It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.
Adventure across a modern cityscape filled with raids, dungeons, and lots of monsters in this gorgeous action RPG based on the popular webtoon.

editorialNotes.tagline: What goes up, must come down

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Squad up! Build a team of lumberjacks, barbarians, and other famous faces from developer Supercell’s hits in this marvellously manic multiplayer romp.

Using one-finger gameplay, mastering movement is essential while you unlock power-ups and overwhelm monstrous legions. Death may be inevitable–but with persistent boosts and new heroes, playing never feels hopeless.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Dominate the lanes of this highly polished multiplayer online battle arena as a rocket-loving robot, a bunny-like mage or another unique hero from a list of dozens.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Kill the dead to stop Doomsday

editorialNotes.standard: Death’s never been funnier. Funny enough that when we die while poking a bear or wiring house lights, we’re as happy as when we live. Win or lose, these clever, cartoonish mini-games make survival an irresistible challenge.

From the second Barry Steakfries busts through that laboratory wall, Jetpack Joyride thrusts you into an unforgettable horizontal adventure. This stylish infinite runner gets your pulse pounding as you feverishly snag coins, dodge obstacles and take rides in crazy vehicles (think: robotic dragons and money-propelled birds). It’s a classic that’s only gotten better over the years, thanks to Halfbrick Studios' consistent updates.
editorialNotes.short: Brilliant controls and loads of fun power-ups that don't fade with age.

editorialNotes.tagline: Knock one out of the park
